summary: WARNING LIGHTS ON DASHBOARD APPEAR INTERMITTENTLY.  THE LIGHTS THAT COME ON ARE THE PASSENGER AIRBAG LIGHT AND THE ADVANCE TRACTION CONTROL.  ALSO THE PASSENGER AIR BAG LIGHT ON THE MIDDLE OF THE DASHBOARD FLASHES OFF AND ON.  ONLY HAPPENS MAYBE 20% OF THE TIME.  HAVE HAD IT TO THE DEALER TWICE, THE CODES THAT COME UP THEY HAVE NEVER SEEN BEFORE SO CAN'T DIAGNOSE THE PROBLEM. WHEN I DO TAKE IT IN MOST OF THE TIMES THE LIGHTS DON'T COME ON SO THEY ASK WHETS THE PROBLEM?  I DON'T KNOW IF THE CAR IS SAFE TO DRIVE OR NOT. *TR
